events.title: Marble: A Multimodal World Model
events.description: Marble, our frontier multimodal world model, was released.

events.title: RTFM: A Real-Time Frame Model
events.description: A research preview of RTFM, a new generative world model that generates video in real-time as you interact with it.

events.title: Generating Worlds
events.description: Sharing our early progress toward persistent, navigable 3D worlds you can explore in your browser.

events.title: A New Frontier
events.description: A look at the next frontier of AI—spatial, world‑model‑driven experiences—and what they enable for creators and developers.

products.name: Marble
products.description: Powered by best-in-class generative 3D world models, Marble enables anyone to create spatially cohesive, high-fidelity, and persistent 3D worlds from just a single image, video or text prompt.

provenance.snippet: Our first product, Marble, is powered by best-in-class generative 3D world models and enables anyone to create spatially cohesive, high-fidelity, and persistent 3D worlds from just a single image, video or text prompt.
